sentence.Network_en: It does hold you to certain standards of fairness.
sentence.Network_cn: 它的确能让你恪守某些公平原则。

sentence.Network_en: He says the new document will guar-antee fairness for blacks in Georgia.
sentence.Network_cn: 他说这个新文件将保证佐治亚州的黑人受到公平对待。

sentence.Network_en: Americans have an innate sense of fairness.
sentence.Network_cn: 美国人有一种天生的公平观。

entry.def: Fairness is the quality of being reasonable, right, and just.

example.ex: He says the new document will guarantee fairness for blacks in Georgia.
example.tran: 他说这个新文件将保证佐治亚州的黑人受到公平对待。

example.ex: ...concern about the fairness of the election campaign.
example.tran: 对于竞选公平性的关注

entry.tran: 说句公道话;公平地说;公正地说
entry.def: You use fairness in expressions such as in fairness to and in all fairness when you want to add a favourable comment about someone or something that you have just mentioned and to correct a false impression that you might have given.

example.ex: In fairness to Bates, he always made it very clear that Webb was only on trial until the end of the season...
example.tran: 替贝茨说句公道话，他意思一直很明确，韦布在本赛季结束前只是试用。

example.ex: There is much more to be said, in all fairness, on both sides of the issue.
example.tran: 公平地说，问题的正反两面都还有很多要说的。

sentences.sentence: "the judge recognized the fairness of my claim"

auth_sentence.content: Its only right, for the fairness of taxpayer!

auth_sentence.content: But the deeper failing is one of essential fairness.

auth_sentence.content: The obsession with "fairness" puts growth secondary.

Sentence.sentence: To ensure fairness to reporters, it is important to set up a system for stories to be proposed and reviewed.

sentences.en: a way of achieving fairness to the accused
sentences.cn: 为被告求得公正的方法

sentences.en: the need for fairness in applying these rules
sentences.cn: 执行这些规则时所需要的公平

sentences.en: Their reputation for fairness is a matter for pride.
sentences.cn: 他们公正的名声令他们引以为豪。

sentences.en: These women are demanding fairness and equality in their pay.
sentences.cn: 这些妇女要求在薪酬方面的公正和平等。

sentences.en: Any incomes policy must embody the attributes of fairness and flexibility.
sentences.cn: 任何收入政策都应该具有公平与灵活性之特征。

sentences.en: The new system of waiting lists should guarantee fairness to all patients.
sentences.cn: 新的候诊名单系统应当保证对每一位病人都公平。

sentences.en: Her sunburnt skin accentuates the fairness of her hair.
sentences.cn: 她那晒黑了的皮肤突出了她的一头金发。

means.word_mean: (用于维护某人或某种说法)公平地说，说句公道话

sentences.en: In all fairness to him, he did try to stop her leaving.
sentences.cn: 说句公道话，他的确曾设法阻止她离开。
